citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 12:30 pm on
9/9/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on door of residence, honked gov horn,
hollered out, went to building across road (informed that licensee has not been at home all morning). No other person
available for inspection.. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:00 12:30 pm on 
9/9/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by knocking on door of residence, honked gov horn, 
hollered out, went to building across road (informed that licensee has not been at home all morning). No other person 
available for inspection.. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation 
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
